definition: east/host (i.e. sitting on east side of guest)/landlord

sentences.english: This pattern is also widespread among Near Eastern societies.
sentences.chinese: 這種模式近東社會中也很普遍。

sentences.english: An interpreter and guide in the near east.
There are many sacred / holy shrines in the Near East.
sentences.chinese: 在近東地區有許多神聖莊嚴的廟宇。

sentences.english: A woman's dress style that imitates the caftan cloaks worn by men in the near east.
sentences.chinese: 模仿近東男士穿的長袖外衣的一種女士衣服。

sentences.english: And we have in Ancient Near Eastern iconography thrones of this type.
sentences.chinese: 在古近東時期的肖像研究中我們看見過這樣的寶座。

sentences.english: Become familiar with the various web sites and discussion groups dealing with ancient Egypt and the Near East (EEF, ANE, ABZU, etc.).
sentences.chinese: 熟悉古埃及和近東相關的各種網站和討論羣。

sentences.english: In 1973, he graduated magna cum laude in Near Eastern Languages and Civilization.
sentences.chinese: 1973年，他以優等成績從近東語言與文明系畢業。

sentences.english: Opposite the Workers' Stadium. Close to the East Gate Plaza.
sentences.chinese: 在工人體育館的對面，臨近東環廣場。

sentences.english: China continued to export high-quality fabric to Europe and the Near East along the silk road.
sentences.chinese: 中國繼續沿着絲綢之路向歐洲和近東出口高質量絲綢。

sentences.english: The whole seed is used extensively in the cuisines of the Middle East and Asia.
sentences.chinese: 在近東和亞洲烹調中廣泛地使用整粒種子。

sentences.english: National Coordinators' Meeting on Criteria and Indicators for Sustainable Forest Management for Near East Countries.
sentences.chinese: 近東國家可持續森林管理標準及指標國家協調員會議。

sentences.english: Expert Meeting on Criteria and Indicators for Sustainable Forest Management in the Near East.
sentences.chinese: 近東可持續森林管理標準及指標專家會議。

sentences.english: They participated at the very earliest stages in the wider religious and cultic culture of the Ancient Near East.
sentences.chinese: 他們從最初就影響着，廣泛古代近東地區的宗教信仰。

definition: Dulan county in Haixi Mongol and Tibetan autonomous prefecture 海西蒙古族藏族自治州[Hai3 xi1 Meng3 gu3 zu2 Zang4 zu2 zi4 zhi4 zhou1], Qinghai
Puli, town in Nantou county 南投縣|南投县[Nan2 tou2 xian4], central Taiwan
Kenting National Park on the Hengchun Peninsula 恆春半島|恒春半岛[Heng2 chun1 Ban4 dao3], Pingtung county, south Taiwan
pinyin: Ken3 ding1 Guo2 jia1 Gong1 yuan2

definition: Taitung city in southeast Taiwan, capital of Taitung county
Su'ao town in Yilan county 宜蘭縣|宜兰县[Yi2 lan2 xian4], Taiwan
Dr Sun Yat-sen (1866-1925), first president of the Republic of China and co-founder of the Kuomintang/same as 孫中山|孙中山
